description: The COVID-19 pandemic is declared by WHO, impacting global health.
NASA's Perseverance rover lands on Mars, beginning its exploration.
The Tokyo 2020 Olympics are held in 2021, showcasing global athletic talent.
The 2022 FIFA World Cup takes place in Qatar.
James Webb Space Telescope launched and begins operations, offering new views of the universe.
The Summer Universiade 2021 is held in Chengdu, China.
The 2022 Winter Olympics take place in Beijing, China.
NASA's Artemis I mission is launched, marking the return to lunar exploration.
Elon Musk completes the acquisition of Twitter.
A record-breaking heatwave in North America leads to significant weather changes.
The James Webb Space Telescope captures its first images, providing new insights into space.
The 2021 Cop26 Climate Change Conference takes place in Glasgow.
The first successful powered flight on Mars is conducted by NASA's Ingenuity helicopter.
The global release of the highly anticipated video game, 'Elden Ring'.
A significant archaeological discovery is made in Egypt, unveiling ancient artifacts.
